- We can’t change anything about that  + > Photos UI. Can’t save accounts, can’t start them in a specific place. I can look into selecting photos from Photos directly though. I think there might be some permission issues, but I’m not positive.
- Can easily change save to DONE
- I’m hesitant to make a preview for static images that is “This is how it will look on wallpaper” as I don’t know what the centering logic is now/what it will end up being. Making it scroll like the wallpaper would not be easy. It would be simple to remove the preview button from static images.

- Why is the photo card an issue?
- I didn’t know where to get the 3 star icon or I would have used it. Would be happy to add it if someone could get it to me. I also have two different states for that icon. If it is filled in, it is downloaded to the device and if the star is just an outline it has not yet been downloaded. I didn’t want to add any more icons for state so I was using that instead.
